description: Answer these questions about the music of the 1990's.

questions.question: What was the name of Beyoncé's girl group?
What song about Marilyn Monroe did John Elton re-dedicate to Princess Diana?
What movie featured Whitney Houston's song "I Will Always Love You"?
Who were the best-selling boyband of the 1990's?
What was Geri Halliwell also known as?
Who would do anything for love (but not that)?
What anniversary rock festival in 1999 was not all about peace, love, and understanding?
What word means "ten thousand spoons, when all you need is a knife"? (according to Alanis Morrissette)
Who discovered Snoop Dogg?
Who liked big butts (and could not lie)?
What band got knocked down, but got up again?
What Public Enemy rapper wore a gigantic clock as a necklace?
Who was the best-selling country artist of the decade?
What band was Robbie Williams a member of?
What song name-dropped Garbo, Monroe, Dietrich and DiMaggio?
What singer was miseducated?
What city did Boys II Men come from?
Who toured around the world - from London to the Bay?
What briefly-popular genre of music was exemplefied by KoЯn and Limp Bizkit?

Which one of Coolio's song's was the best selling single of 1995?

What group is comprised of Left Eye, T-Boz, and Chilli

title: 1990's Music Trivia #2
